what-p.en: CrypTools is an organisation who tries to deliver great ciphers and hash functions. Basically, we provide multiple ways of encrypting messages in various programming languages so that you can safely and anonymously communicate with anyone. All our snippets / piece of code are licensed using the MIT License and explained with simple README.md. We are waiting for new contributors who are also passionate about modern cryptography, to help others being more productive. Because we truly believe that we can make the world üåé a more secure place.

contrib-p.en:
We're always trying to provide all of our ciphers and functionality with the majority of existing programming languages. However, we would need new contributors programming in different languages.
Also, we try to provide several README markdown files to simply explain each cipher. If you could help us creating those, it would be very appreciated.
Finally, if you‚Äôre not able to help, remember that leaving a star ‚≠êÔ∏è on our projects can help get more people involved !
